lat = function(A){
  pra = "\\begin{bmatrix}\n"
  for(i in 1:dim(A)[1]){
    pra = paste0(pra,paste0(A[i,],collapse=" & "))
    if(i<dim(A)[1]){pra = paste0(pra,"\\\\\n")} else {pra = paste0(pra,"\n")}
  }
  pra = paste0(pra,"\\end{bmatrix}")
  return(pra)
}

strt = function(s){
  if(s==-1){
    return("-")
  } else if(s==1){
    return("")
  } else {
    return(as.character(s))
  }
}

md = function(s){
  if(s==-1){
    return("-")
  } else if(s==1){
    return("+")
  } else if(s<0){
    return(as.character(s))
  } else {
    return(paste0("+",s,collapse=""))
  }
}

prs = function(M,lets=c("x","y","z","q","r","s","t","u","v","w")){
  s = "\\begin{align*}"
  for(i in 1:dim(M)[1]){
    row = ""
    nc = dim(M)[2]
    ls = lets[1:(nc-1)]
    row = paste0(strt(M[i,1]),ls[1],collapse="")
    for(j in 2:(nc-1)){
      row = paste0(row,md(M[i,j]),ls[j],collapse="")
    }
    row = paste(row,"&=",M[i,nc],"\\\\\n",collapse="")
    row = sub("0x+","",row,fixed=T)
    row = sub("0x-","-",row,fixed=T)
    row = sub("0y+","",row,fixed=T)
    row = sub("0y-","-",row,fixed=T)
    row = sub("+0z","",row,fixed=T)
    row = sub("-0z","",row,fixed=T)
    s = paste0(s,row,collapse="")
  }
  s = paste0(s,"\\end{align*}",collapse="")
  return(s)
}

Question
========

Find the [determinant](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Determinant) of $A$.

$$A=`r lat(A)`$$

Find $\det(A)$. The determinant is also noted with vertical lines, like absolute value.

$$\det(A) = `r latdet(A)`$$

In order to find the determinant of a 2x2 matrix:

$$\det\left(`r lat(L)`\right) ~=~ `r latdet(L)` ~=~ ad-bc$$

Find the determinant of $A$.

Solution
========

$$(`r a`)(`r d`)-(`r b`)(`r c`) ~=~ `r dA`$$
